title: Camera Lock Bug
body: My camera will not lock unless I hold spacebar please tell me how to fix this because I've lost 5 ranked games because of it...

replies.body:
there is an icon on the far right above the minimap which locks the camera.
Also by default pressing Y locks it.
press the y buton. you should get used to playing with an unlocked camera, it's much more useful.

Ohhhhh This problem I had this before you don't press y to solve this. This is what you do use your mouse to drag the box which is the white rectangle to show where your camera is on your map drag it around it should unlock. Hope this helps =]
I know but pressing Y does not work for me :(
